contents:
how ccp use propaganda to brainwash teenagers about the outbreak

verse:
sobbing the corona

I am leaving,
back to America,
my great hometown America, (painting the US as the origin of the virus)
with regrets being here,
where got my ass beaten,
where too many mountains, (names of concentration camps and Famous Doctor)
Fire mountain, thunder mountain, and Dr. Zhongnan Mountain...
the godlike Chinese Government,
lockdowning the cities,
volunteering the nurses,
who fight to get in the front line,
one by one with no hesitation,
what a badass china is! (and yes Chinese teenagers always believe in positive energy!)
